description: A change recently went in (https://review.openstack.org/#/c/12368/) to allow hard reboots to be performed on soft_rebooting instances. This leads to an unfortunate situation in libvirt where a SOFT_REBOOT that is ignored by the guest followed by a HARD_REBOOT will lead to a situation where the reboot occurs twice. First the manual hard reboot will go through, and then the soft reboot will timeout, causing another hard_reboot.
title: soft_reboot followed by hard_reboot can lead to double reboot

comments.content: A change recently went in (https://review.openstack.org/#/c/12368/) to allow hard reboots to be performed on soft_rebooting instances. This leads to an unfortunate situation in libvirt where a SOFT_REBOOT that is ignored by the guest followed by a HARD_REBOOT will lead to a situation where the reboot occurs twice. First the manual hard reboot will go through, and then the soft reboot will timeout, causing another hard_reboot.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: I can't think of a great way around this. The best short term fix I can come up with is to check to make sure the task state is still in SOFT_REBOOTING when the soft reboot fails. Not the best strategy for no_db_compute but probably workable.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: I really would like to avoid reading the db from the driver layer, so assigned to yun to see if he has any other ideas.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
I have an idea, we can use the ID of domain in libvirt to recognize the hard reboot has been implemented or not, because the ID will be +1 when instance was destroyed and start again.
During the soft reboot, we get the domain ID every waiting loop, and check it is changed or not, if changed, we believe a hard reboot has done and ignore this soft reboot.
Vish, can you give me any more suggestions?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hzwangpan

Author: Wangpan <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jan 8 13:54:19 2013 +0800

    Fix double reboot issue during soft reboot
    
    Using the ID of domain in Libvirt to recognize the hard reboot has been
    implemented or not, if the ID changed, we believe the domain has been rebooted,
    return True and break from soft reboot.
    
    Fixes: bug #1046356
